title: Which K-pop group has the highest value? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe at the moment that BTS certainly are the richest and have the highest net worth as a group but not so individually. They have around 60–65 mill USD. LAST YEAR THEY BROUGHT BIG-HIT ENTERTAINMENT AROUND 62 BILL KRW. THESE GUYSS ARE F,,..ING RICH!!!! NOT COUNTING ALL THE ASSETS AND DAMN EXPENSIVE BUILDING AND CARS THEY HAVE!!!! INDIVIDUALLY ( NOT COUNTING OTHER ASSETS AND OWNED PROPERTIES…) RM- 8 MILL USD J HOPE - 12 MILL USD JIN - 8 MILL USD JIMIN 8 MILL USD V - 8 MILL USD JUNGKOOK - 8 MILL USD SUGA - 8 MILL USD REFER SITE FOR ADDITIONAL INFO BTS's Net Worth Is Completely Out of This World HOPE THAT ANSWERED YOUR QUERY HAVE A NICE DAY………

That’s pretty easy. It’s none other than BTS. Their most recent album, Map of the Soul: Persona has recorded the most sales for a kpop album. In terms of concert sales, their most recent Love Yourself World Tour brought in more than one million fans worldwide and generated more than US$71.7 million in ticket sales. Their popularity is at its peak and it’s no wonder they are the richest kpop group as of now. Forbes even ranked them 43rd in the article which included Top 100 richest people of 2018 (or 2019 perhaps). Followed by BTS are Twice, BlackPink, TVXQ, EXO, Seventeen, Wanna One, Red Velvet and GOT7 (in order).

I don't know much about where groups are talented or whatnot, but this is a very vague question that one can go in depth with. Some groups are doing EXTREMELY well in America, while other groups are well known in say, China or Japan. It really all just depends from WHICH country viewpoint you are looking from and what kind of “value” you're asking about. Is it monetary value? Networth? Most talent (which in that case, completely subjective), best looks? Like what do you mean by “value"?
